error.checkout_error: Something went wrong, please try again later.
error.file_not_signed_pdf: This does not seem like a signed PDF.
error.passkey_expired_try_again: Passkey Challenge Expired. Reload Page and Try Again.

help.account_name: Enter the name of the account.
help.add_response_note: Add a note or a comment to this response. Notes are visible only to users with access to this response.
help.allowed_countries: Enter ISO country codes (2 characters) of allowed countries separated by a new line or comma. An empty list means all countries are allowed.
help.api_key_features: Select features enabled for this API key.
help.api_key_referrer_domains: List domain names, one per line, allowed to be used with this API key.
help.api_key_secret: Auto-generated secret value. Changing the secret requires updating your apps.
help.auditlog: Select the level of event tracking.
help.auditlog_retention: The tracked events will be deleted after the specified period.
help.block_default_value: Enter the optional default value of the field.
help.block_expression: Enter a conditional expression. The field will be shown only when the condition matches.
help.block_label: Enter the label for the field.
help.block_help: Enter optional instructions related to the field that help users understand what they should enter. Supports Markdown syntax.
help.block_hidden: Hidden fields are not presented to the user. Use _Default value_ to enter the field's value.
help.block_name: Enter the unique name for the field.
help.block_placeholder: Enter optional placeholder text for the field. Will be shown only when the field is empty.
help.block_readonly: Makes the field read-only, disallowing changes by the user.
help.block_required: Required fields must be filled in before submitting the form.
help.block_size: Select the size (width) of the block.
help.captcha_complexity: Configure the PoW complexity for the Captcha.
help.collect_context_info: Whether to collect IP addresses and basic browser information with submissions.
help.custom_labels: Define a set of custom labels you can assign to responses.
help.emergency_user: Emergency users can log-in using a secret login address and a password in case of emergencies. They always have the _admin_ role.
help.emergency_user_password: Enter a strong password for the emergency user.
help.enable_encryption: Whether to protect submission data using Encryption Shield. __Recommended__.
help.encryption_key: Select encryption key for this form.
help.export_include_attachments: Include files, attachments and signatures in the export.
help.export_individual_files: Generate an individual file for each response.
help.feature_available_only_for_licensed_oss: This feature is available only in licensed distributions.
help.floating_captcha: Displays the Captcha as a floating element upon form submission.
help.footer_text: The text shown under the form in the footer. Supports Markdown.
help.form_badges: The badges to show under the form in the footer.
help.form_locale: Select the language to use for the form UI.
help.form_name: Give the form a good descriptive name. It won't be shown publicly.
help.form_password: Choose a password for this form and share it with anyone who needs to access it.
help.form_presentation_mode: Select the form's presentation mode. Use _hidden_ to allow only API and/or HTML submissions.
help.form_status: Only _Published_ forms are accessible to people.
help.identities_search: Search for identities using the ID, external ID, or the user's email address.
help.invisible_captcha: Use invisible Captcha instead of the widget.
help.recovery_passphrase: The passphrase will be required during the recovery process. Use something easy to remember, such as the name of your first pet. Optionally, set a hint below.
help.recovery_passphrase_hint: Enter any text that will help you recall the passphrase during the recovery process.
help.response_display_blocks: The form fields to display in the list of responses. Select fields that indicate the sender or subject.
help.restricted_access: Enable restricted access to allow access to configuration and data only to selected users.
help.select_input_options: Enter options users can select from separated by a new line or comma.
help.show_confetti: Whether to show confetti effect on the success page.
help.smtp_sender: Enter the email address of the sender (the from address).
help.smtp_url: Enter the URL of your SMTP starting with smtp://
help.signature_download_pdf: Download the completed form as PDF.
help.signature_sign_pdf_certificate: Sign the downloaded PDF with your digital certificate.
help.signature_upload_signed: Once signed, upload the PDF or DigiDoc signature.
help.signature_upload_signed_pdf: Once signed, upload the PDF back.
help.submit_label: When left empty, the default "Submit" will be used for the button.
help.success_redirect: A URL to redirect to after a successful submission. Data variables are available.
help.success_text: The text to be shown after a successful submission. Supports Markdown.
help.user_role: Select the user's role. The Admin role grants access to all settings.

label.auditlog_retention: Retention of audit log data (in days)
label.label: Label
label.name: Name
label.title: Title

description.email: Sends an email to configured recipients.
description.http: Proxies form data to an HTTP endpoint.
description.spamfilter: Classifies form data with the Spam Filter.
description.store: Stores form data in the application database.

help.email_attach_pdf: Whether to attach the response as a PDF file.
help.email_body: Enter the text of the email. Submitted fields are available as variables {$.data.field_name}.
help.email_recipient: Enter the recipient's email address. Separate multiple addresses with commas.
help.http_headers: Extra HTTP headers as name:value pairs, each on a new line.
help.http_url: Enter the URL address of your server.
help.reject_spam: Discard submissions classified as spam without processing them further.
help.store_retention: Enter the data retention (in days) after which responses will be deleted. A value of 0 (zero) indicates unlimited retention.
help.terminate_on_failure: Forcefully terminate further processing on failure or error.

text.account_usage: The limits are defined by your billing plan. Upgrade to a higher plan to increase the limits.
text.accept_terms: I have read and accept the Terms of Service.
text.add_steps: Convert this form into a multi-step form by adding a new step.
text.analytics_not_enabled_for_plan: Analytics are not available in your billing plan.
text.analytics_responses_select_fields: Select fields you want to analyse and click the __Analyse__ button.
text.api_key_update_delay: Any changes to the API key may take approximately 10 minutes to propagate.
text.app_footer: [ALTCHA](https://altcha.org/) is a community-driven, open-source project dedicated to privacy, security, and regulatory compliance.
text.auditlog_info: Audit log allows you to track access and changes to data with detailed information about the user.
text.available_seats: You have {available} available seats out of {max} seats.
text.block_logic_info: Block logic allows you to show or hide fields using conditions.
text.block_name_not_unique: There is another field with the same name. Field names should be unique.
text.checkout_vat_info: Our payment partner, Paddle.com, manages invoicing and taxes. VAT or sales tax will be added to your purchase based on your country's regulations. You can enter your VAT number during checkout to receive a tax-compliant invoice, subject to regional availability.
text.checkout_security_info: This page is secured with encryption. Your data will be processed by our billing partner, Paddle.com. All transactions are handled securely, ensuring your personal information is protected.
text.confirm_change_block_type: Changing the type will remove configured options. Continue?
text.confirm_delete_account: Are you sure? Data will be lost.
text.confirm_delete_form: Are you sure? Data will be lost.
text.confirm_delete_identity: Are you sure? Data will be lost.
text.confirm_delete_response: Are you sure you want to delete this response?
text.confirm_key_invalidate: Confirm you want to invalidate the key {name}. Cannot be reverted.
text.confirm_remove_recovery_passphrase: Removing the recovery passphrase is not recommended. Are you sure?
text.confirm_unsaved_changes: You have unsaved changes. Discard them?
text.create_account: New accounts are created with the free billing plan. You can upgrade later in the account's settings.
text.custom_smtp_info: You can configure a custom SMTP server, which will be used to send emails and notifications.
text.dashboard_no_forms: You haven't created any forms yet. Start by creating one from a template.
text.date_range_max_days: The date range cannot exceed 31 days.
text.delete_account: You are about to permanently delete the account {account}. This operation will permanently delete all account's data, and the deletion cannot be reverted!
text.delete_form: Here you can delete this form and all its data. After confirming the deletion, all form submissions and related files will be permanently deleted.
text.delete_identity: You are about to delete the identity **{id}** along with all its __{responses} responses__. This action will __permanently__ delete data from the database and is irreversible.
text.delete_user: You are about to permanently delete your user account. This operation will permanently delete all account's data, and the deletion cannot be reverted!
text.download_encrypted_file: This file is protected by the Encryption Shield. The file will be downloaded to your browser and safely decrypted.
text.download_encryption_key: To save the key, first download it to your computer and store it securely, for example, on a flash drive.
text.drag_fields_to_pdf: Drag and drop fields to the PDF.
text.drop_image_here: Drop or select an image here...
text.email_not_verified: Your email has not been verified. Please check your inbox for the verification email we sent you.
text.emergency_access: Please enter the email address and password of the emergency user to log in.
text.encryption_disabled: The Encryption Shield is disabled for this account.
text.encryption_keys_info:
The encryption shield encrypts your data to keep it secure. Remember, these keys are crucial for decrypting your data. If you lose them, you will permanently lose access to your encrypted data, as they cannot be recreated or retrieved.

You can disable encryption for your account in the settings.

To manage private encryption keys used for decryption, navigate to [your profile](/app/profile/encryption_keys).
text.export_x_errors: Failed to export {x} response(s) likely due to missing encryption keys.
text.feature_unavailable_for_plan: This feature is unavailable for your billing plan.
text.form_created_with: This form was created with [ALTCHA Forms](https://altcha.org/forms).
text.form_not_available: This form hasn't been published yet or it has been deleted.
text.form_not_found: The form you're looking for cannot be found.
text.form_restricted: Access to the form's configuration and data is restricted to selected users.
text.form_submission_failed: We could not submit your data. Please try again later.
text.form_unexpected_error: An unexpected error occurred during the submission. Please try to submit later.
text.form_unrestricted: All your team-members can access configuration and data.
text.form_without_fields: This form doesn't have any steps or fields.
text.identities_info: Identities are anonymized user IDs that enable you to quickly search for and delete data associated with a specific user.
text.identity_linked_to_responses: This identity is linked to {count} response(s).
text.limit_reached: You have reached the limit of your current plan.
text.license_info: To configure your Commercial Licence use the environment variable `LICENSE`. Refer to the [documentation](https://forms.altcha.org) for more details.
text.new_encryption_key: The new encryption key below is securely generated on your device.
text.no_blocks: This step doesn't have any blocks yet.
text.no_notes: You don't have any notes here.
text.no_responses: You don't have any responses yet.
text.no_steps: There are no steps in this form.
text.note_send_to_email: This note will be sent to _{email}_.
text.passkey_info:
Sign in or sign up securely using passkeys protected by biometrics such as fingerprints, face scans, or hardware devices.

If you don't have an account, create a new one during authentication.
text.passkey_not_supported: It looks like your device doesn't support Passkeys. Please use a device with biometric authentication to log in.
text.price_info: Prices listed are exclusive of VAT/sales tax. Pricing is subject to change in accordance with our Terms of Service.
text.private_encryption_keys: The private encryption keys are stored locally on this device, in this browser.
text.processors: Form processors handle submissions and process, transform, or store the form data.
text.recover_access: Recover access to your account if you lost the Passkey. Enter your email address and follow the instructions from the email.
text.recover_access_sent: Check your email inbox and follow the instructions.
text.recover_access_instructions:
Due to security reasons, the recovery request will be validated after a certain amount of time. Wait until the request is validated to confirm it.

If you haven't requested the recovery, cancel the request immediately.
text.requires_javascript: This page requires JavaScript to function properly. Please enable JavaScript in your browser.
text.response_stream_errors: Errors were detected, likely due to missing encryption keys.
text.security_check: Please complete the security check to submit the form.
text.select_region_to_register: Select a different region to authenticate or register.
text.share_encryption_key: Share the downloaded private key with your team-mates who need access to the app. Otherwise, they won't be able to read the encrypted data. They can import keys in their profile.
text.subscription_created: Your subscription has been successfully created! Please allow a few minutes for your account to be activated.
text.this_is_spam: This message was identified as spam and will be deleted soon.
text.update_block_after_adding: You can update and configure the field later.
text.upgrade_for_premium_templates: Upgrade your plan to access premium templates and features.
text.user_not_found_info:
The email address __{email}__ was not found in our database.

To register, please accept the Terms of Service and click the _Register_ button.
text.user_not_found_passkeys: In the next step, __you will authenticate using your biometrics__ (Passkeys). Follow the on-screen instructions to complete your registration.
text.verify_email: We need to verify the ownership of your email. Please click Verify to confirm it.
text.viewing_demo_data: You're viewing randomly generated demo data.
text.warning_no_encryption_keys: To secure your data with encryption, create a new encryption key.
text.wrong_link: This is not a valid link.
